name: azure-tenant-deploy
description: Deploy ARM template to Azure tenant
author: JamieTaffurelli

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager Subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location for the Subscription deployment to take place

inputs.name: csmFileLink
inputs.label: Template link
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the URL of the template file.

inputs.name: csmParametersFileLink
inputs.label: Template parameters link
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the URL of the parameters file.

inputs.name: csmFile
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path or a pattern pointing to the Azure Resource Manager template.

inputs.name: csmParametersFile
inputs.label: Template parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path or a pattern pointing for the parameters file for the Azure Resource Manager template.

inputs.name: extraParameters
inputs.label: Extra template parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify parameters not in your parameters file. To view the template parameters in a grid, click on “…” next to Extra Parameters textbox.

inputs.name: deploymentName
inputs.label: Deployment name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the name of the Tenant deployment to create.
